alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 5:10PM CDT until March 30 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN RANKIN...NORTHERN SCOTT AND EAST CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 510 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Farmhaven, or 12 miles east of Canton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Ludlow around 520 PM CDT. Tuscola around 535 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Lena, Walnut Grove, Redwater and Standing Pine. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
